name: Dental Emergency Simulator: U.S. Precariat Edition
name_original: Dental Emergency Simulator: U.S. Precariat Edition
description:
Dental Emergency Simulator: U.S. Precariat Edition is a bureaucratic horror story based on true events.

Features:

  • tedious phone calls
  • a byzantine labyrinth of bureaucratic red tape
  • spreadsheets
  • physical pain
  • mental anguish
  • a happy ending

Content warning:
There is discussion of a medical emergency and a minor reference to self harm ideation. Please be safe while playing and do not force yourself to play if you feel uncomfortable.

This was made for the O2A2 2023 Queer Edition game jam and  the Queer Games Bundle 2023.
